transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning sir, main Karan baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji sir, good morning.
Executive: Abhi kal 9696 mein aapne call kari thi na meri mam se bhi baat hui thi ki aapne kisi ko apna matlab mal ki supply kari aur usne aapki payment dene se mana kar diya block vagera kar diya.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Usse related kam ke liye maine call kiya tha sir. So aapke pass sari details hai ya fir mujhe mam se baat karni padegi?
Customer: Nahi, details batao mujhe kya chahiye aapko, main de deta hu.
Executive: Ek to sir main aapko pehle ye bata deta hu, main puri aapko shuruwat se last tak ka process bata deta hu. Jo aapne 9696 pe call kari hai na sir, wo usme jo complaint raise hoti hai wo IndiaMART se service ke related hoti hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai na? To ab isme hum karenge kya ki jo details mere ko aap se chahiye wo main aap se mang lunga. Aap jab wo mujhe share kar denge to uske baad kya kehte hai main aapke liye ticket raise karunga buyer supplier ki. Fir aapke pass buyer supplier team se phone aayega ki aapka kya kya conflict hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai na? Aur jab main aapko ticket ID raise kar du to ye wala ticket main close kar dunga aapka jo current mein abhi khula hua hai services leke, thik hai na sir?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ek to sir jaise ki aapne samne wali party ko jo bhi saman becha wo IndiaMART ke upar onboarded hai sir?
Customer: IndiaMART ke upar to I think pata nahi shayad hai nahi hai but wo client IndiaMART se hi aaya tha. Matlab uska proper catalog vagera sab bana hua hai IndiaMART pe pehle hi.
Executive: Wahi main puch raha hu sir, kuch naam pata hai uski firm ka aapko?
Customer: Haan haan, bilkul pata hai. Smeriton Laboratories Private Limited.
Executive: Spelling bolna sir?
Customer: S M A S M A R I T O N R I T O N Laboratories Laboratories Private Limited. Private Limited.
Customer: Katak, Odisha.
Executive: Thik hai Katak ka hai kya? Main ye dekh leta hu ye paid client hai ki nahi hai IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Paid to nahi hoga jahan tak hai.
Executive: Haan sir, paid client to nahi hai ye IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Jo hamari nahi payment dega wo IndiaMART ki kya dega?
Executive: Pehle kabhi tha bhi aapka ye?
Customer: Khair ab sir main aapko batau. Pata nahi main main wahi keh raha hu sir, IndiaMART se ek client juda tha, payment dene se mana kar diya.
Executive: Nahi sir, jo best ho sakta hai wo karwa ke dete hai. Ye bataiye sir mobile number hai iska aapke pass jisse aapki baat hoti thi?
Customer: Haan haan, do number hai, dono likh lo aap.
Executive: Bol dijiye aap.
Customer: Ek isme bhi likha hua hai vaise IndiaMART pe bhi, baki aap likh lo. 98610
Executive: 98610
Customer: 16150
Executive: 16150 koi alternate number bhi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, ek aur hai iski.
Customer: 83838
Executive: 83838
Customer: 47250
Executive: 47250 email ID hai iski koi?
Customer: Email ID bhi hai ek minute ruko.
Customer: S M A R V I T S M A R V I T 90@gmail.com
Executive: S M A R V I T? Haan ji, Smarvit. Smarvit, thik hai. Iski koi GST ki details hai aapke pass?
Customer: GST ki bhi hai ek second ruko.
Customer: Ye na iski dusri firm ki hai GST.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Matlab iski billing kisi aur firm mein hoti thi, payment kisi aur firm se aati thi.
Executive: Achha achha achha.
Executive: To bata dijiye details aap mujhe de dijiye main likh lunga yahi pe.
Customer: 21 A K E 21 A K E
Executive: A for apple, K for kite?
Customer: Haan ji. Thik hai. 21 A K 21 A K EPM EPM Thik hai EPM E for egg, P for pet, M for Maharashtra. Ji 0269 0269 P for pet P for pet 1 Z 0 1 Z 0 thik hai. Aur aapne jo dusri firm ka hai. Achha ye dusri firm ka hai jo paisa aata tha wo dusri firm se aata tha. Haan jo paisa aaya tha thoda bohta wo Smeriton Laboratories se aaya tha iska. Hmm hmm. Aur jo bill katata tha wo is GST number pe katata tha. Matlab iski firm ka naam hai Patnaik Associates billing wali firm ka. Okay. Aur aapke sir apne kuch bills tax invoices jo isse related kate hue hai jo isne saman kharida hai? Haan mere pass transport ki bility bhi hai aur bill bhi hai. Aap sir meri email ID pe wo bills vagera mail kar dijiye. Meri mail ID aap likh lijiye. Ek second ruko. Boliye sir. K A R A N Haan ji. .B H A T I A .B H A T I A Bhatia. Bhatia thik hai. @indiamart.com Thik hai. Bills vagera mail karke na aap mere personal number pe call karke mujhe bata dena. Mere personal number likhiye aap 7088 Haan ji. 946 Haan ji. 834 Thik hai. Main aapko fir reference number send kar do jo bhi aapki complaint main raise karunga uske baad se fir ye wala aapka complaint main close kar dunga sir, thik hai na? To kya ho sakta hai matlab aapke end pe isme? Sir ek to pehle IndiaMART use hi nahi kar payega samne wala banda. Wo to chhodo wo to vaise bhi nahi kar raha hai. Aur baki hamari jo legal team hai isko call karegi jo aapko best support kar sakti hai karegi. Dono ka aapas mein interaction karaya jayega is tarike se hoga. Interaction to dekho shayad aapko bata diya hoga puri baat to kyuki cheh saat mahine se payment nahi hua hai. Hmm. Aur matlab unnecessary reasons bana raha hai bhai mera GST block ho gaya hai. Mera account freeze ho gaya hai ye wo. To matlab wahi hai last isne abhi 15th November ko last date pai thi ki main 15 se pehle pehle kar dunga 15 tak kar dunga. Samajh gaya. To kal 17 thi kal bhi maine do teen bar isko call kiya baat chit ki. Hmm. To matlab fir maine raat ko sham ko isko call kiya 7 baje ke aas pass. Hmm. To whatsapp pe isne kabhi ye kya karta tha matlab isne kya kiya ek do number se mujhe pehle block kar diya. Hmm hmm. Whatsapp pe bhi block kar diya call pe bhi block kar diya. Hmm hmm. Aise kar karke matlab isne dikkat karni shuru kar di. Hmm. Fir mere ko matlab kal doubt hua fir maine usko sham ko whatsapp pe message bheja fir isne mere ko waha se hi block kar diya. Fir is tarah teen char unknown number se call kiye unknown number se message kiye sab isne bhes badal ke matlab sab block kar diya. Samajh gaya mam ne mujhe bataya tha. Hoti hai sir IndiaMART ki buyer supplier ki dispute team hoti hai. Kai ye case matlab aapke sath hi nahi kaiyo ke sath ho jata hai. To best upayega manage kar. Normal si baat hai to hota hi hai to isme to koi normal si baat hai. Thik hai na main raise karta hu aapki complaint aap mujhe tax invoice aur transport ke jo bills vagera hai aap mujhe send kar dijiye. Sare hi bhejne padenge ek do bhej do? Jispe dispute hai wo bhej dijiye aapne bataya na kuch payment to aayi hui hai aapke pass jo disputed hai wo wali bhej dijiye. Dispute to sir dekho aisa hai na char panch bill gaye hai aur ek do payment aayi hai. Hmm hmm hmm. Wo cheez hai. Main jo mere pass bill abhi hai available do teen transport ki bility hai main wo aapko share kar deta hu. Chaliye thik hai mujhe mail kar dijiye. Statement statement aapki jo iski bani hui hai wo main aapko whatsapp kar deta hu ya wo mail kar deta hu. Thik hai. Thik hai sir, thik hai thik hai. Thik hai. Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received payment from a client.

- Client is making excuses for non-payment.

- Client has blocked the customer's numbers.



Resolution:

- Executive will raise a ticket for buyer-supplier issue.

- Executive requested details of the client and invoices.

- Executive provided his email and personal contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the requested documents via email.

- Executive will send a reference number after raising complaint.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, dispute, client details, invoices, block
